name: MyPong (PholaX)
description:
Transport to the woods to play the classic arcade game !

Controls:
Start menu / Game Over screen:
Up/Down - choose mode
Space - start a game / go to menu

Game:
Player 1: 
W, A - up
S, Z - down

Player 2:
Up, K - up
Down, M - down

My first "real" game, made with Python (Pygame Zero) to learn how to code the classic arcade games.
